snippet: What is the current average noise level in an N.F.L. stadium on game day?
abstract: What is the current average noise level in an N.F.L. stadium on game day?
lead_paragraph: In “Ground-Shaking Noise Rocks N.F.L., and Eardrums Take Big Hit,” Joyce Cohen writes about the possible downside of being “loud and proud” in football stadiums.

headline.main: 6 Q’s About the News | Are You Ready for Some Earplugs?
